title: Problems of the Italian school system 2019
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories for the x axis representing Response, and a y axis representing Share of respondents.
The highest category is found at Lack_of_opportunities_to_enter_into_the_labor_market where Share of respondents is 26.0.
The lowest category is found at Others where Share of respondents is 2.0.

data.Response: Lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market
Lack of financial aid for low-income families and students

gold: In a survey conducted in December 2019 , the largest group of respondents indicated the the lack of opportunities to enter into the labor market as the main problem of Italian schools . Furthermore , 21 percent of interviewees stated that the lack of funding and resources was a relevant problem in the Italian school system .
